subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text:
; “to soak; excessive; to let loose; licentious”
: Related to {{och-l|婬|licentious}}, {{och-l|霪|heavy rain}} and {{och-l|霖|continued rain}} ({{zh-ref|Wang, 1982}}). More [[allofam]]s possibly include {{och-l|瀋|liquid}} and {{och-l|沉|to submerge}} ({{zh-ref|Schuessler, 2007}}). Probably related to {{inh|zh|sit-pro|*l-(t/d)jam||to fill, flat}}.

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[soak]]; to [[permeate]]; to [[drench]]
# to [[paint]]; to [[dye]]; to [[decorate]]
# to [[spread]]; to [[diffuse]]; to become [[prominent]]
# to [[move]] [[around]]; to [[shift]]; to [[travel]]
# to [[exceed]] [[boundary]]; to [[overstep]] one's [[authority]]
# [[excessive]]; [[uncontrolled]]; [[immoderate]]; [[overindulgent]]
# [[great]]; [[sizeable]]; [[immense]]; [[big]]
# to [[rain]] for a [[prolonged]] [[period]] of [[time]]; to have [[continuous]] [[heavy]] [[rain]]
# [[meretricious]]; [[flashy]]; [[ostentatious]]
# [[extravagant]]; [[squandering]]; [[wasteful]]
# [[evil]]; [[wicked]]; [[sinful]]; [[crafty]]
# [[in]] [[disorder]]; [[disorderly]]; [[chaotic]]; [[disorganised]]
# to [[confuse]] or be [[confused]]; to make someone [[dazed]] and confused
# to [[let]] someone have his or her [[own]] [[way]]; to [[allow]] to [[run]] [[wild]]
# to [[indulge]] in; to [[overindulge]]; to [[abandon]] oneself in; to be [[greedy]] for
# to have [[illicit]] [[sexual]] [[relation]]s; to [[commit]] [[adultery]]
# [[licentious]]; [[obscene]]; [[lewd]]; [[lascivious]]; [[depraved]]; [[pornographic]]
# {{zh-alt-form|深|[[deep]]; [[deeply]]}}

# {{zh-only|淫預|dot=:}} {{zh-alt-form|灩澦|a [[dangerous]] [[pile]] of [[rock]]s in the [[middle]] of the [[Yangtze]] River in [[Sichuan]]}}
